title: Life Cycle Properties
description: This schema defines Life Cycle Properties.

created.description: Created information of the data asset

created_at.description: Timestamp of data asset when it got created

created_by.description: User that created the data asset

updated.description: Updated information of the data asset

updated_at.description: Timestamp of data asset when it got updated

updated_by.description: User that updated the data asset

accessed.description: Accessed information of the data asset

accessed_at.description: Timestamp of data asset when it got accessed

accessed_by.description: User that accessed the data asset

deleted.description: Deleted information of the data asset

deleted_at.description: Timestamp of data asset when it got deleted

deleted_by.description: User that deleted the data asset

created.description: Information about created aspect of the data asset

updated.description: Information about updated aspect of the data asset

accessed.description: Information about accessed aspect of the data asset

deleted.description: Information about deleted aspect of the data asset
